DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study was to determine the prevalence of latent tuberculosis infection among injecting drug users and to conduct randomized controlled trial to evaluate a case management intervention aimed at increasing TB screening and treatment entry among injecting drug users referred from a methadone drug treatment program in Estonia.
DOC.brief_title: Enhanced Tuberculosis Case Detection Among Substitution Treatment Patients
DOC.criteria: Participation in substitution treatment program, Age 18 years or more, Able to read and write in Estonian or Russian, Able to provide informed consent
